Description:
Clientserver technology, a leading player in the management consulting industry, is seeking an enthusiastic and motivated US IT Recruiter to join its dynamic and innovative team. The US IT Recruiter will be responsible for attracting and identifying top IT talent to support various client services in the US market. This position is perfect for an individual with strong networking skills and a passion for technology, who enjoys working in a fast-paced environment and is committed to delivering the highest level of service to clients.Develop and execute recruiting strategies to attract top IT talent, leveraging various sourcing channels including social media, job boards, and industry events
Review resumes, conduct interviews, and facilitate the hiring process, including making job offers and negotiating salary packages
Build and maintain strong relationships with candidates and clients, providing a high level of service and support throughout the recruitment process
Collaborate with hiring managers and human resources teams to understand business needs and facilitate successful hires
Utilize applicant tracking systems to ensure all candidates are properly tracked and evaluated throughout the recruitment process
Stay up-to-date on current trends and technologies in the IT industry to better understand candidate skillsets and market conditions
Develop and maintain a network of industry contacts to proactively identify potential candidatesJob Details
